title: Jottacloud: Upload without md5 no longer supported. Use header JMd5. (Bad Request)
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
Get error "Upload without md5 no longer supported. Use header JMd5. (Bad Request)" when uploading files.
The weird thing is that I already copied over 1 TB of files into Jottacloud but suddenly these messages appeared.

#### What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
rclone/v1.42-099-g751bfd45β

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Linux arm64

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Jottacloud 

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
rclone sync genc:/fotos jenc:/fotos -v --stats=0m5s --transfers=12

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
`2018/08/14 10:18:59 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2018/08/14 10:18:59 DEBUG : HTTP REQUEST (req 0x44201c9100)
2018/08/14 10:18:59 DEBUG : POST /jfs/xxxxxx/Jotta/Archive/enc/rknteor33698etn6ep3ujak624/bs0m85n6307etaqsmlvvkmr0es/llat37i7b6f8ascc5af2edqbv8/fo858cksneeb9iao2sflh2ehuo/64c66d8s4ok9cena7mcoav68no?umode=nomultipart HTTP/1.1
Host: www.jottacloud.com
User-Agent: rclone/v1.42-099-g751bfd45β
Content-Length: 1094919
Authorization: XXXX
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Jmodified: 2017-07-25-T05:19:08Z
Jsize: 1094919
Accept-Encoding: gzip

2018/08/14 10:18:59 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2018/08/14 10:19:00 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/08/14 10:19:00 DEBUG : HTTP RESPONSE (req 0x44201c9100)
2018/08/14 10:19:00 DEBUG : HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Content-Type: text/xml
Date: Tue, 14 Aug 2018 10:18:59 GMT
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age= 31536000
X-Id: 941012035096
X-Resp: 124

2018/08/14 10:19:00 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2018/08/14 10:19:00 ERROR : alle/2007/1/07_150004_0.jpg: Failed to copy: Error 400: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Upload without md5 no longer supported. Use header JMd5. (Bad Request)
2018/08/14 10:19:00 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>`
